started:
I can forward (copy) messages from any telegram chats (private/public channels, private/public groups, direct chats, bot) to one or many chats as soon as they arrive.
❇️ Here Are My Features ❇️
— User-friendly Dashboard
— Forwards chats (public or private)
— Forwards Topics

Don't know how to start 🤔🤔🤔?
👉 Click here to watch the start guide
👉 Click here to read document
forward:
❇️ Forward Help Menu ❇️

Gunakan untuk mengatur pesan penerusan otomatis.

🛠 Panggil /getchanel atau /getgroup atau /getuser sebelum menggunakan perintah ini untuk mendapatkan ID obrolan.

Gunakan sintaks berikut untuk menambahkan channel/user/bot:
/forward ACTION LABEL SOURCE_CHAT_ID -> TARGET_CHAT_ID

🆘 Catatan penting: LABEL tidak boleh mengandung spasi, karakter khusus, Anda harus membuatnya sesederhana mungkin

===============
For Example

➡️ One to One Chat
/forward add work1 22222 -> 66666

➡️ Many to One Chat
/forward add work1 22222,33333 -> 66666

➡️ One to Many Chat
/forward add work1 22222 -> 66666,77777

➡️ Many to Many Chat
/forward add work1 22222,33333 -> 66666,77777
addNotInclude: Tolong tambahkan "add" pada /forward add <label> source_id -> target_id
phoneNumberInvalid: Pasikan nomor telpon valid contoh prefix https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_mobile_telephone_prefixes_by_country
textGetGroup:
🚫 Please wait a moment, this may take a few minutes. In the meantime, don't send too many similar requests. 🚫
Group Title —» ID
textGetChannel:
🚫 Please wait a moment, this may take a few minutes. In the meantime, don't send too many similar requests. 🚫
Channel Title —» ID
pleasePrivateChat: Maaf untuk menggunakan perintah ini harap private chat dengan bot
firstConnection:
**Connect Help Menu**

Use it to connect your account with Auto Forward Message Telegram Bot, You will need at least one connected account with Auto Forward Message Telegram Bot to use other commands

Enter the phone number of the telegram account which is already a member of the desired source chats, along with country code

**Command Arguments**
/connect PHONE_NUMBER

**For Example:**
/connect +84444444444

You can find every country prefix code by

Don't know how to start 🤔🤔🤔?
